package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: Graph -- Language for typesetting graphs
package-manager.description: Grap is a language for typesetting graphs specified and first implemented by Brian Kernigan and Jon Bentley at Bell Labs. It is an expressive language for describing graphs and incorporating them in typeset documents. It is implemented an a preprocessor to Kernigan's pic language for describing graphs.
